about_the_game: This DLC is just a donation to the developers. It contains NO content. This DLC will NOT add or change any behavior to the application. This DLC WILL support the developers to support on-going development expenses, enabling better support for existing and future platforms.
detailed_description: This DLC is just a donation to the developers. It contains NO content. This DLC will NOT add or change any behavior to the application. This DLC WILL support the developers to support on-going development expenses, enabling better support for existing and future platforms.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04/18.04, SteamOS, Arch/Manjaro (64-bit)
  • Processor: i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970/ AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04/18.04, SteamOS, Arch/Manjaro (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 6-core or better, Intel 8th gen 6-core or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970/ AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970/ AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better.

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 x64
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 6-core or better, Intel 8th gen 6-core or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970/ AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
